name: Pixel Nightmare
description:
Pixel nightmare is a puzzformer: a 2D platformer puzzle game in which you control a clumsy character who can’t use many abilities at the same time. You have to use magic orbs to activate the ability you need to use to pass the level. you need to plan how to reach the goal.

The build is for Android devices.

Used free assets with non commercial purpose.

Developed with Unity 2018.4.
